values: 看；观看；观察；注视；小心；留意；当心；（短时间）照看；看护；照管
表；手表；（旧时的）怀表；观察；注意；监视；注视；警戒；守望；值班；守夜；值夜；警戒时段；值班人员；守夜人；警戒人；值班船员；监护；照看；看守

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 观察者；看守人；哨兵；（美）选举监票员

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重以客观的态度进行观察。
指用眼睛跟随某物，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。

word_group.brief_definition: 当心, 留神, 注意
心急水不开(越心急, 时间过得越慢), 守着看壶壶不开
(用于命令)等待下面发表的消息, 关注后继进展
盯着钟表(算计着不超过规定的工作时间, 或只盼望下班而无心工作)
闲看人来人往, 静观众生百态
注意时间(以便按时完成或到达)

bilingual.source: This is the best time to watch them.
bilingual.target: 这是观看它们的最佳时间。
人们今天仍然观看这些戏剧。

bilingual.source: We climb up rocks or watch from docks.
bilingual.target: 我们爬上岩石或从码头观看。

bilingual.source: Check your answers in Before You Watch.
bilingual.target: 在“观看前”中检查你的答案。

bilingual.source: A crowd of 30,000 people watch the race each year.
bilingual.target: 每年有三万人观看比赛。

bilingual.source: Tourists watch a black rhino in the crater.
bilingual.target: 游客在火山口观看一只黑犀牛。

bilingual.source: The audience sat on stone seats to watch the performances.
bilingual.target: 观众坐在石座上观看表演。

bilingual.source: Watch the film clip and check if you are correct.
bilingual.target: 观看电影片段并检查你是否正确。

list.abstract: watch（英 [wɒtʃ]，美 [wɑːtʃ]），英文单词，作动词为观看；注视；观察等释义。作名词为手表；观察；注视等释义。短语搭配有watch out（小心, 提防）。例句为“I really want to watch Operation Red Sea.（我真的想看《红海行动》。）” watch作及物动词时的近义词有protect，look into。作不及物动词时的近义词有sight，regard。作名词时的近义词有observation，monitoring，surveillance。

Watch 即 赵在杰 韩国英雄联盟（LOL）职业选手，前星际争霸职业选手（已退役） 效力于Najin俱乐部，目前在Najin White Shield担任担任打野位置 擅长英雄：蜘蛛女皇、盲僧、寡妇制造者、雪人骑士、永恒梦魇、虚空掠夺者等。 主要荣誉：2012OGN冬季赛冠军、2013年NLB春季赛冠军、2013年NLB夏季赛冠军、2014年OGN春季赛亚军、S2世界总决赛八强、S3世界总决赛四强、S4世界总决赛八强等。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you gonna be in the next play? I'm not even allowed to watch the next play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能参加演出么？我连观看的权利都被剥夺了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you're here tonight. Why not come specially? You could watch in the pits with the rest of the team.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你今晚不就来了，专程来一趟吧？你可以跟其他人一起在赛道旁观看。

yingyinNormal.en: At the Temple of Earth, every New Year the emperor would come to worship the God of Earth. Nowadays, people gathered to watch a re-enactment of this ancient ritual.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每年的新年一到，皇帝准备进行祭天仪式了。如今，人们可以聚集来观看这个古代仪式的昨日重现。

yingyinNormal.en: Watch, watch. Ooh. And, and. Ahhhh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看喔。哦！还有喔。哇。

yingyinNormal.en: You watch MI6 agents? We watch everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在监控军情六处的特工吗？我们监控所有人。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's go watch it at your place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去你家看。

yingyinNormal.en: So what are you guys gonna watch?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们打算看什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Plant your trees, watch them grow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 种下你的树木，看着它们成长。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Why you keep looking at your watch?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么你总不停看表？

yingyinNormal.en: This is extremely good. Watch this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这会让你大开眼界，看仔细了。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh-huh. Ross invited us all to watch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯把大家都找去看了。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd better watch your back, Wiggin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你最好小心点儿，维京。

yingyinNormal.en: So, we're on a date? Hey, you watch it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我们是在约会喽？嘿，你小心点。

yingyinNormal.en: No, we were just going. To watch, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正要走呢。去看，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I bet Albert is on perimeter watch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来Albert出去巡逻了。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you going to watch the speech? Mother?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会看讲话吗，母亲？

yingyinNormal.en: This movie baffles me every time we watch it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次看这部电影，我都很困惑。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a boy. Watch. I'm going to call him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是有个男孩，看着，我要叫他过来。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you watch on thanksgiving? The parade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你们感恩节看什么？游行。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you know, I go to watch a basketball game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，我会去看篮球赛。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看; 观看; 观察; 监视

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 观看；注视；观察；注意；小心；节制；守夜；监视；留意；当心

sense_info_list.zh: 看; 观看; 观察; 监视

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Watch</highlight> people get on and show their tickets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看人们上车并出示车票。

examination_example.sentence: Another set of participants had to count backward from 1,000 by nines as they <highlight>watched</highlight> the clips, occupying their conscious working memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一组参与者在观看视频时必须从1000到9倒着数，这会占据他们有意识的工作记忆。

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>watching</highlight> what people search for, click on and say online, companies can aim "behavioural" ads at those most likely to buy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过观察人们在网上搜索什么、点击什么、说什么，公司可以将“行为”广告瞄准那些最有可能购买的人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Watch</highlight> out for how they verbalize with others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 注意他们是如何与他人交谈的。

examination_example.sentence: He accepted gifts such as a Rolex <highlight>watch</highlight> and a Ferrari automobile from a company seeking access to government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他接受了一家寻求与政府接触的公司赠送的礼物，比如一块劳力士手表和一辆法拉利汽车。

sense_info_list.en: a period during which a person is stationed to look out for danger or trouble, typically during the night

word_usage.usage: 都指“看；观看”时，look侧重短暂的看的动作，但并不一定能看见，有时用来唤起别人的注意。see侧重看的结果；也指眼睛看得见或观看比赛、电视节目等。watch指在一段时间内关注某人或某事。observe指注意到某事物，或为了解某人、某事而对其进行仔细观察。
可以用 watch 或 look at 来表示某人注意看某事物。一般来讲，watch表示注视移动或变化的事物，look at 表示注视静止的事物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 看守人；值夜人；巡夜人
n. 看门狗；监察人员；监督人员
adj. 警惕的；注意的；警戒的；醒着的；不眠的

word_family.mean: v. 观看；注视；观察；注意；小心；节制；守夜；监视；留意；当心

sense_info_list.en: look at something for a period of time, especially something that is changing or moving

examination_example.sentence: Parents should instead <highlight>watch</highlight> with their kids and help them to understand the plot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母应该和孩子一起观看，帮助他们理解故事情节。

examination_example.sentence: What should parents do right after <highlight>watching</highlight> the TV program?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母看完电视节目后应该做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Hundreds of tourists and Parisians stood and <highlight>watched</highlight> the flames leaping from the roof.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百名游客和巴黎人站在那里，看着火焰从屋顶上滚落。

examination_example.sentence: Richemont hit the headlines in May for taking back £437 million of <highlight>watches</highlight> for destruction to avoid marked-down prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5月，历峰收回并销毁4.37亿英镑的手表以避免降价，成为了头条新闻。

sense_info_list.en: follow them secretly or spy on them

examination_example.sentence: This idea is based on the principle that lions and other predators are far less likely to attack when they feel they are being <highlight>watched</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个想法是基于这样一种原理，即当狮子和其他掠食者感到被监视时，它们发动攻击的可能性要小得多。

examination_example.sentence: At 43, I've reached the stage where women are warned to <highlight>watch</highlight> out for the creeping sadness of middle age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 43岁时，我已经到了这样一个阶段:女性被警告要警惕中年时期逐渐蔓延的悲伤情绪。

word_usage.usage:
“看见某人做某事”用watch sb. (to) do sth.，侧重指看到动作全过程，动词多为瞬间动词。watch sb. doing sth.表“看见某人正在做某事”，指正在进行或反复发生的动作，多使用延续性动词。
示例：我看见他正在吃早饭。
误 I watched him eat his breakfast.
正 I watched him eating his breakfast.

提问手表指示的时间，一般用it而不用watch作主语。
示例：你的手表几点钟了?
误 What time is your watch?
正 What time is it by your watch?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 警惕的；注意的；警戒的；醒着的；不眠的

word_family.mean: v. 观看；注视；观察；注意；小心；节制；守夜；监视；留意；当心

sense_info_list.en: look at something for a period of time; especially something that is changing or moving

examination_example.sentence: Alzheimer's patients tend to <highlight>watch</highlight> television more than 3 hours a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔茨海默病患者每天看电视的时间往往超过 3 小时。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, you can move a TV to the kitchen and <highlight>watch</highlight> your favorite shows while you're standing at the sink.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可以把电视移到厨房，站在水槽边看你最喜欢的节目。

examination_example.sentence: Should you tell your friends, for instance, that they're being recorded while you all <highlight>watch</highlight> the big game together?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你是否应该告诉你的朋友们，当你们一起观看大型比赛时，他们正在被记录下来？

sense_info_list.en: follow them secretly or spy on them

examination_example.sentence: If a contractor is working in your home, you don't need to tell them that there are cameras <highlight>watching</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果一个承包商在你的家里工作，你不需要告诉他们有摄像头在记录。

examination_example.sentence: The intern likely took the letter again once nobody was <highlight>watching</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦没有人看信了，实习生可能会再次拿走这封信。

examination_example.sentence: Colleagues who don't trust one another will need to spend more time <highlight>watching</highlight> their backs than doing any useful work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 彼此不信任的同事会将更多的时间用于提防对方，而不是做任何有用的工作。

word_usage.usage:
“看见某人做某事”用watch sb. (to) do sth.，侧重指看到动作全过程，动词多为瞬间动词。watch sb. doing sth.表“看见某人正在做某事”，指正在进行或反复发生的动作，多使用延续性动词。
示例：我看见他正在吃早饭。
误 I watched him eat his breakfast.
正 I watched him eating his breakfast.

提问手表指示的时间，一般用it而不用watch作主语。
示例：你的手表几点钟了?
误 What time is your watch?
正 What time is it by your watch?

exam_freq_info.chinese: 小心; 当心; 留神
[sing.; U]注视; 注意; 警惕; 监视

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It'll be more fun to <highlight>watch</highlight> the game with a friend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和朋友一起看比赛会更有趣。

examination_example.sentence: And if I can't get a ticket, I <highlight>watched</highlight> the game on TV.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我买不到票，我就在电视上看比赛。

examination_example.sentence: I really like <highlight>watching</highlight> tennis games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真的很喜欢看网球比赛。

sense_info_list.zh: 小心; 当心; 留神

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Watch</highlight> out for the traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当心车辆。

examination_example.sentence: He has no <highlight>watch</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有手表。

sense_info_list.zh: [sing.; U]注视; 注意; 警惕; 监视

word_usage.usage: 作“看，观察”讲时，跟名词或代词：They were watching the football match. 他们当时正在看足球比赛。
作“看，观察”讲时，跟带现在分词的复合结构：They watched the children playing in the garden. 他们看孩子们在花园里玩耍。
作“看，观察”讲时，跟不带to的不定式的复合结构：We watched her cross the street. 我们看着她走过街道。
作“看，观察”讲时，跟从句：Just watch what will happen when I press the button. 看着我按下按钮会发生什么。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Every year in China, thousands of people <highlight>watch</highlight> dragon boat races.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，每年都有成千上万的人观看龙舟比赛。

examination_example.sentence: Many of them have <highlight>watched</highlight> thousands of hours of TV.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的许多人已经看了几千个小时的电视。

examination_example.sentence: When I was <highlight>watching</highlight> a funny movie, I suddenly started laughing and couldn't stop myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我在看一部有趣的电影时，我突然抑制不住地笑了起来。

sense_info_list.en: look at something for a period of time, especially something that is changing or moving

examination_example.sentence: We encourage children to <highlight>watch</highlight>, imagine and create their own works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们鼓励孩子们观察、想象和创作自己的作品。

examination_example.sentence: The writer's friends <highlight>watched</highlight> him at the bottom of the valley.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位作家的朋友在谷底注视着他。

examination_example.sentence: They were <highlight>watching</highlight> me from a safe area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在一个安全的地方看着我。

examination_example.sentence: When his grandchildren arrived, they promised him they would find the <highlight>watch</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他的孙子孙女们来到时，他们向他保证会找到那块手表。

examination_example.sentence: While he was working, he lost his favorite <highlight>watch</highlight> which was a gift from his deceased（已故的）wife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他在工作的时候，他丢失了他最喜爱的手表，那是他已故妻子送给他的礼物。

examination_example.sentence: Jenny's grandparents sent her a <highlight>watch</highlight> for her fourteenth birthday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍妮的祖父母送给她一块手表作为她14岁的生日礼物。

examination_example.sentence: I'm looking for someone careful and patient to <highlight>watch</highlight> my kids when I'm working from 11: 00 am.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我正在寻找一个细心和耐心的人，当我从上午11点开始工作时，他会照顾我的孩子。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe the teacher who is <highlight>watching</highlight> over all the kids needs someone to talk to as well．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许照看所有孩子的老师也需要找人倾诉。

sense_info_list.en: follow them secretly or spy on them

examination_example.sentence: dislike being <highlight>watched</highlight> secretly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不喜欢被秘密监视。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>watch</highlight> over the behavior of the students in the classroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 监督学生在教室里的行为。

word_usage.usage:
“看见某人做某事”用watch sb. (to) do sth.，侧重指看到动作全过程，动词多为瞬间动词。watch sb. doing sth.表“看见某人正在做某事”，指正在进行或反复发生的动作，多使用延续性动词。
示例：我看见他正在吃早饭。
误 I watched him eat his breakfast.
正 I watched him eating his breakfast.

提问手表指示的时间，一般用it而不用watch作主语。
示例：你的手表几点钟了?
误 What time is your watch?
正 What time is it by your watch?
